 With over 15 years experience of working with the uk’s leading utilities companies, housing developers and construction contractors , we take great pride in considering ourselves an expert utility design & construction provider of the highest quality and work tirelessly to maintain premium standards for our valued clients 

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Features” module_id=”what-we-do-best” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”0|0px|99px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#1b75bc” header_2_font=”Playfair Display|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”38px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” header_3_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#edbb5f” header_3_font_size=”14px” header_3_letter_spacing=”1px” header_3_line_height=”2em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”7000px” locked=”off” inline_fonts=”Lato”]

EXPERTISE

WHAT WE DO BEST

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”60px” module_alignment=”center” height=”2px” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”experience” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%267%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_circle=”on” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”24px” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_font_size=”14px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_letter_spacing=”1px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”30%” animation=”off” border_style_all=”dashed” locked=”off”]

We’ve got more than 15 years under our belts as Multi Utility and our senior team has many more working for major PLCs.  You’ll experience that implied quality from the first time you deal with us.

Our initial focus was on the design and project management of utility networks, working alongside established network providers and large construction companies. 

Our reputation for service, performance and cost competitiveness has seen us grow consistently since then.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”A ONE STOP SHOP” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%166%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_circle=”on” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”24px” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_font_size=”14px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_letter_spacing=”1px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”30%” animation=”off” border_style_all=”dashed” locked=”off”]

You’ll find everything you need in-house because that means we can ensure that the quality and performance we demand is adhered to.  Every job, every time.

We cover every aspect of the design, construction and project management of utilities.  Years of expertise, embedded in our business.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”fully accredited” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%273%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_circle=”on” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”24px” _builder_version=”3.25.4″ header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_font_size=”14px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_letter_spacing=”1px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”300ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”30%” animation=”off” border_style_all=”dashed” locked=”off”]

We’re accredited from top to toe at Multi Utility because we know that nothing other than auditable performance and the highest standards count.  You’ll find our accreditations here

In addition, we’ve secured the internationally-recognised MCS certification, the leading quality assurance benchmark covering the supply, design, installation and commissioning of renewable micro generation technologies such as solar PV, heat pumps and wind turbines.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”a personal service” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%305%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_circle=”on” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”24px” _builder_version=”3.25.4″ header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_font_size=”14px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_letter_spacing=”1px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”30%” animation=”off” border_style_all=”dashed” locked=”off”]

Our culture places you at the heart of business. After all, without you there isn’t one.
You’re guaranteed access to a director at all times, each being a fully-qualified engineer in their respective field. They put your interests front and centre, acting with absolute integrity at all times.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”expertise” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%175%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_circle=”on” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”24px” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_font_size=”14px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_letter_spacing=”1px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”30%” animation=”off” border_style_all=”dashed” locked=”off”]

Our expertise covers the full spectrum, from design through to construction, with a project management capability overlaying everything we do.  We have a full service resource in house, ensuring adherence to the very highest standards, guided by our array of rigorous accreditations and management standards.

 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://multiutilityuk.com/about-us/#our-team” button_text=”OUR MANAGEMENT TEAM” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.25.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#c12c2d” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_radius=”0px” button_font=”Montserrat|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Team” module_id=”our-team” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ background_color=”#282828″ custom_padding=”100px|0px|99px|0px” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”38px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” header_3_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#edbb5f” header_3_font_size=”14px” header_3_letter_spacing=”1px” header_3_line_height=”2em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”7000px” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”18px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”21px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off”]

PEOPLE

A TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”60px” module_alignment=”center” height=”2px” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”29px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_width_px=”1440px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_team_member name=”ALISTAIR CAMERON CENG BENG (HONS) MIET MIGEM MIOW FIHEEM FCIBSE” position=”MANAGING DIRECTOR” _builder_version=”4.9.1″ header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c12c2d” header_font_size=”14px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”40px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” icon_hover_color=”#edbb5f” locked=”off” icon_color__hover=”#edbb5f” icon_color__hover_enabled=”on”]

From his formative years with Oldham Borough, United Utilities, and RW Gregory & Partners to his current role as Managing Director with MultiUtility UK, Alistair has gained over 40 Years of experience in major projects including airports, healthcare, large commercial /retail/leisure development and educational establishments. As a chartered building services engineer, Alistair has a keen interest in sustainability which has led to his involvement in Healthcare, including project management, design and construction of Modular Healthcare Projects. Alistair is also actively involved in the Institute of Healthcare Engineers and Estates Managers (IHEEM), being Chair of the North West Region and a Trustee of IHEEM.

[/et_pb_team_member][et_pb_team_member name=”David Whitehead DIP SURV CEM” position=”COMMERCIAL DIRECTOR” _builder_version=”4.0.7″ header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c12c2d” header_font_size=”14px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”40px|||” custom_padding=”||9px|||” icon_hover_color=”#edbb5f” locked=”off” icon_color__hover=”#edbb5f” icon_color__hover_enabled=”on”]

David is a qualified surveyor with 40 years of experience in the industry overseeing refurbishment, new build, design and build, and measured
term contracts ranging from a few hundred pounds to several million. He has successfully liaised with a varied clientele encompassing Private, Local Authority, Housing Association, Government Department and Health Authority partners.

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.7″ custom_margin=”-16px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”27px|0px|27px|0px|false|false” custom_width_px=”1440px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_team_member name=”Tommy Gates” position=”OPERATIONS MANAGER” _builder_version=”4.0.7″ header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c12c2d” header_font_size=”14px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” body_font=”Poppins||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”40px|||” icon_hover_color=”#edbb5f” locked=”off” icon_color__hover=”#edbb5f” icon_color__hover_enabled=”on”]

Tom is one of the UK’s foremost operations managers in the utilities sector, with a long track record delivering complex, large-scale commercial developments.  There isn’t much he hasn’t dealt with and our clients trust him implicitly.  

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5″
